channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Texas Official Warns Against ‘Measles Parties’ Amid Growing Outbreak
item.description: At least 146 measles cases have been identified in West Texas so far, including 20 hospitalizations and one death.

item.title: Ben Horowitz donates Cybertruck fleet to the Las Vegas police

item.title: 14 Best Hoodies for Style, Comfort, and Warmth (2025)
item.description: Whether you’re lounging around at home, running errands, or going on a hike, we’ve got the perfect option for you.

item.title: Mchose GX87 Ultra Review: A Refined but Accessible Mechanical Keyboard
item.description: The GX87 brings innovations from the custom keyboard space to a much more affordable price.

item.title: Samsung's Affordable Galaxy A36 and Galaxy A26 Will Get 6 Years of Software Updates
item.description: The company’s latest affordable smartphones are thinner and more durable and have a sprinkling of AI.

item.title: Researchers explore how to build shapeshifting, T-1000-style robots

item.title: 11 Best Strollers for Almost Every Budget and Need (2025)
item.description: Whether you’re pushing your kid down the street or running on a trail, we have a stroller for you.
